song.title: Rakkautta Vain
song.info:
Compo winner at Abduction'95 music competition.
CREDITS Sinewave: Song, lyrics, backgrounds Chanel5: Something Fornicator: Vocals, lyrics
Original lyrics & translation
VERSE kovin kauan siitä on kun viimeksi kohdattiin paljon olemme muuttuneet toisiimme juuttuneet
osaato enää rakastaa muistatko kukkas kastaa muistatko enää mua osaatko rakastua
CHORUS sua tahdon ain rakastaa sut tahdon lähellä tuntea sua tahdon vain maksusta rakkautta oi, rakkautta vain (2x)
(2nd verse same as the first)
CHORUS
--
"nothing but love"
it's so long time since we last met much have we changed (we're) got stuck with each other
are you still able to love do you remember to water your flowers do you still remember me are you able to fall in love
I want to love you always I want to feel you near me I want you only by paying for it* oh love, nothing but love
translation by fk
*) had to listen this line many times before I could believe my ears. It really seem to suggest that singer wants his beloved only if he has to pay for her (this can be a reference to purchasing sex even though it does not make much sense in this context)
